TITLE: U.S. to require negative Covid test for travelers from China as virus spreads
SUMMARY: The new policy comes amid a surge in Covid cases in China and as fears of a new variant emerge

TITLE: Novak Djokovic says there are no hard feelings over deportation as he returns for Australian Open
SUMMARY: Djokovic has won the Australian Open a record nine times, including the last three times he played. Rafael Nadal won the 2022 title in Djokovic’s absence

TITLE: Risk of a dangerous new Covid variant in China is ‘quite low,’ U.S. health expert says
SUMMARY: No new Covid variant has emerged despite perhaps billions of omicron infections worldwide this year, said Dr. Chris Murray of the University of Washington

TITLE: Promising new Covid pill shows key advantages over Paxlovid in trial
SUMMARY: A Chinese antiviral pill was found to be as effective as Paxlovid in a Phase 3 trial, and it appeared to cause fewer side effects

TITLE: Wuhan is once again besieged by Covid — three years after it recorded the world's first cases
SUMMARY: “Everyone has accepted it quite openly,” said one resident of Wuhan, where coronavirus cases have exploded. “People are just desperate to move in a good direction now

TITLE: Flu and RSV on the decline but Covid hospitalizations rise
SUMMARY: Holiday gatherings and travel, however, could send flu activity up again, experts caution

TITLE: What is the XBB.1.5 subvariant? CDC reports a new strain of omicron taking over in the U.S.
SUMMARY: About 40% of confirmed U.S. Covid cases are caused by the XBB.1.5 strain, up from 20% a week ago

TITLE: Hong Kong to resume hamster imports a year after mass cull over Covid
SUMMARY: Officials in the Chinese territory had been criticized over their response to an outbreak of the delta variant that was traced to a pet shop

TITLE: China reopens borders in final farewell to zero-Covid policy
SUMMARY: After three years and months of protest, China unsealed land and sea crossings and ended a requirement for travelers to quarantine on arrival

TITLE: Pentagon drops Covid-19 vaccination mandate for troops
SUMMARY: Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin’s memo has been widely expected since legislation to end the mandate was signed into law Dec. 23

TITLE: China's Covid wave threatens another snarl of U.S. medical supply chain
SUMMARY: U.S. efforts to lessen the health care system's reliance on China will be tested in the coming weeks and months as the coronavirus rolls through China

TITLE: Some newly mailed Covid tests from the government expire imminently — even with extensions
SUMMARY: The FDA extended the shelf life of iHealth Covid tests by six months this summer, but many kits still expire in February, and some have already

TITLE: Long Covid symptoms ease for most within a year, new research finds
SUMMARY: Ongoing fatigue, loss of smell, weakness and trouble breathing can be scary and debilitating following Covid. A new study suggests most people do get better

TITLE: Satellite images hint at Covid outbreak's true toll in China
SUMMARY: Social media users have questioned the government’s reporting, pointing to the recent deaths of prominent artists, scientists and academics

TITLE: David Kessler, top health official for Covid vaccines, to leave Biden administration
SUMMARY: Kessler has served as chief science officer in the administration's coronavirus response since January 2021, playing a key role in the rollout of Covid vaccines

TITLE: Could getting Covid raise cholesterol?
SUMMARY: Two recent studies show a link between Covid and higher cholesterol levels in the following year

TITLE: Updated Covid boosters cut the infection risk from XBB.1.5 subvariant by nearly half, CDC finds
SUMMARY: The report provides the first data on how the updated shots fare against the predominant strain in the U.S

TITLE: China says Covid deaths and severe cases have fallen over 70 percent since peak
SUMMARY: A prominent government scientist said 80% of China’s 1.4 billion population had already been infected

TITLE: Sewage from planes is a key Covid tracking tool, reports say, as CDC talks to airlines about wastewater testing
SUMMARY: Analyzing airplane sewage could help scientists track new Covid variants entering the U.S., or identify novel pathogens

TITLE: FDA pulls authorization for AstraZeneca's Covid antibody drug Evusheld
SUMMARY: The drug, meant to prevent Covid in people with weakened immune systems, does not work against the predominant omicron subvariant XBB.1.5

TITLE: Biden plans to end the Covid public health emergency this spring in a major shift to federal response
SUMMARY: The move would have widespread implications for government programs and authorities and mark a new chapter in the federal response to the coronavirus

TITLE: In new oversight role, House Republicans target billions lost to Covid relief fraud
SUMMARY: “Right now, I have no confidence in the federal government’s ability to prevent fraud,” said the House Oversight Committee's new Republican chairman

TITLE: Congress presses Secret Service for more details about state-sponsored foreign hackers stealing Covid relief funds
SUMMARY: At a House Oversight Committee hearing Wednesday, members from both parties cited an NBC News report about a group linked to China's government stealing millions

TITLE: Costs for Covid tests and treatments may rise after federal emergency declarations end in May
SUMMARY: The White House has announced an expiration date for the national and public health emergencies tied to the coronavirus, which have been in place since early 2020

TITLE: Billions stolen in Covid-related fraud, according to estimates
SUMMARY: Three years after the start of the pandemic, the size and scale of Covid-related fraud is staggering. NBC News’ Tom Costello has more details on who may be to blame for the estimated $560 billion stolen in federal relief funds

TITLE: House Republicans take their first swat at Biden’s Covid response
SUMMARY: The hearing is expected to be the first of many by House Republicans around the pandemic response as well as the origins of the Covid virus

TITLE: No new variants emerged from China’s Covid outbreak, study finds
SUMMARY: A genomic analysis found that all infections in Beijing belonged to existing Covid variants, according to a Chinese-funded study published in The Lancet

TITLE: Republicans launch Covid origins probe by requesting info from Fauci and Biden officials
SUMMARY: The panel sent letters to Dr. Anthony Fauci, senior officials like National Intelligence Director Avril Haines and the president of a nonprofit group focused on emerging infectious diseases

TITLE: Immunity from a Covid infection is as protective as vaccination against severe illness and death, study finds
SUMMARY: The immunity generated from an infection was found to be “at least as high, if not higher” than that provided by two doses of an mRNA vaccine
